instructions.da: Drej svagt til venstre mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight left towards Destination 1
instructions.es: Sigue levemente a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gira ligeramente a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén balra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Lakukan agak ke kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Gira a sinistra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: 斜め左に向かい、その後Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.my: ဘယ်ဘက် အနည်းငယ်ဆီသို့Destination 1ကို ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.nl: Ga iets naar links richting Destination 1
instructions.no: Ta en litt til venstre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Łagodnie w lewo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Siga suave à esquerda sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Siga ligeiramente à esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo levo v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sol yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно ліворуч в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.yo: Ṣe a diẹ osi si ọna Destination 1
